entities.name: umbridge
entities.description: Umbridge is the one being addressed by Harry and Yaxley. She is described as raising her voice to address Mrs. Cattermole.

entities.name: yaxley
entities.description: Yaxley is mentioned alongside Umbridge, and both are being considered by Harry for the Muﬄiato charm.

entities.name: hermione
entities.description: Hermione is sitting behind whom Harry takes a seat. He is worried about making her jump, and she does jump when he whispers into her ear.

entities.name: harry
entities.description: Harry is the one who edges his way along the platform behind Umbridge, Yaxley, and Hermione. He considers casting the Muﬄiato charm on Umbridge and Yaxley.

entities.name: mrs cattermole
entities.description: Mrs Cattermole is being addressed by Umbridge, and Harry uses the distraction to whisper into Hermione's ear.

relationships.description: Harry considers casting the Muﬄiato charm on Umbridge and Yaxley.
Harry considers casting the Muﬄiato charm on Umbridge and Yaxley.
Umbridge is addressing Mrs Cattermole during the interview.
